results.title: Efficacy and Tolerability of Telmisartan/Amlodipine + Hydrochlorothiazide Versus Telmisartan/Amlodipine Combination Therapy for Essential Hypertension Uncontrolled With Telmisartan/Amlodipine: The Phase III, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind TAHYTI Study.
results.text_hl: IMPLICATION: TAH triple therapy was more effective than was @<m>CHEMICAL_telmisartan_amlodipine_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C548840 @@@TA@@@ double therapy in reducing BP in these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in Korea with @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ that did not adequately respond to @<m>CHEMICAL_telmisartan_amlodipine_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C548840 @@@TA@@@.

citations.NLM: Sung KC, Oh YS, Cha DH, Hong SJ, Won KH, Yoo KD, Rha SW, Ahn YK, Ahn JC, Jang JY, Hong TJ, Cho SK, Park SH, Hyon MS, Nam CW, Chae IH, Yoo BS, Song JM, Jeong JO, Yoon YW, Kim BS, Yang TH, Cho DK, Kim SH, Choi YJ, Ahn JH, Jeon DW, Kim HS. Efficacy and Tolerability of Telmisartan/Amlodipine + Hydrochlorothiazide Versus Telmisartan/Amlodipine Combination Therapy for Essential Hypertension Uncontrolled With Telmisartan/Amlodipine: The Phase III, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind TAHYTI Study. Clin Ther. 2018 Jan;40(1):50-63.e3. PMID: 29248384
